portfolios.title: What is the country
portfolios.content_zh: 這個網站串接了 REST Countries API，動態取得並呈現各國的資料。使用者可以透過國家名稱搜尋，只要包含搜尋關鍵字的國家都會顯示出來；也可以依據大洲篩選，顯示大洲的所有國家。點擊任一國家可以查看詳細資料，包括相鄰國家的資訊，並能點擊相鄰國家按鈕以查看其詳細資料。此外，網站提供黑夜模式，使用者可以自由切換，享受更舒適的瀏覽體驗。
portfolios.content_en: This website integrates the REST Countries API to dynamically fetch and display data for various countries. Users can search by country name, showing all countries that contain the search keyword, or filter by continent to display all countries within that region. By clicking on any country, users can view detailed information, including neighboring countries, and can click on the neighboring country buttons to see their details. Additionally, the website offers a dark mode for a more comfortable browsing experience, which users can switch freely.
portfolios.copyright: Challenge by Frontend Mentor, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: Space tourism website
portfolios.content_zh: 為了避免 HTML 過於冗長，一個太空旅遊介紹的網站將資料以 JSON 格式儲存。透過 JavaScript，網站會抓取資料並轉換成 DOM 元素節點，再進行渲染。這種方式不僅使得維護和修改資料變得更加便捷，同時也能有效地管理網頁內容。
portfolios.content_en: To avoid excessive HTML code, a website introducing space tourism stores its data in JSON format. Using JavaScript, the website fetches and converts data into DOM nodes for rendering. This approach not only facilitates easier maintenance and data updates but also ensures efficient management of webpage content.
portfolios.copyright: Challenge by Frontend Mentor, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: Forkify recipe application
portfolios.content_zh: 使用 MVC 架構來建制的 app，使用者可以搜尋食譜、建立自己的食譜、將喜歡的食譜加入書籤，而這些資料都會被存在 local storage。
portfolios.content_en: This application utilizes MVC architecture to organize its components effectively. Users can search for recipes, upload their own recipes, bookmark recipes they like, and adjust serving sizes as needed.
portfolios.copyright: Exercise by The Complete JavaScript Course 2024, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: Mapty application
portfolios.content_zh: 使用者可以用 app 紀錄鍛鍊的數據：例如跑步或騎單車，其中包含了距離、時間、位置，更使用了 Geolocation API 讓地圖顯示在精準的位置。
portfolios.content_en: In the exercise, users engage with a web app for logging running and cycling workouts with location data. They input workout details like type (running or cycling), distance, duration, and location using the Geolocation API for accurate tracking.
portfolios.copyright: Exercise by The Complete JavaScript Course 2024, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: WorldWise tracks the adventures
portfolios.content_zh: 使用 React 和 React Component Libraries 建立 WorldWise 網站的練習。用戶在地圖上追蹤他們的冒險經歷，為城市寫下一些備忘錄。
portfolios.content_en: This is a exercise to build WorldWise website with React & React Component Libraries. The user tracks their adventures on the map, write down some memo for cities.
portfolios.copyright: Exercise by The Ultimate React Course 2024, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: The restaurant-list application
portfolios.content_zh: 使用 express.js 和 express-handlebars 建立一個餐廳清單 app，使用者可以查看所有的餐廳、也可以點進去看餐廳的簡介，還能用關鍵字搜尋餐廳或是餐廳分類。
portfolios.content_en: Use express.js and express-handlebars to build a restaurant list app. Users can view all restaurants list, and see the detail about the restaurant. And users can use keyword to search restaurant name or category.
portfolios.copyright: Challenge by ALPHA Camp, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: Pizza menu
portfolios.content_zh: 這是一個使用 React 建立披薩菜單的練習。用戶可以看到披薩的數據包括照片、價格、成分等。
portfolios.content_en: This is a exercise to build pizza menu with React. The user can see pizza's data include price, ingredients, etc.
portfolios.copyright: Exercise by The Ultimate React Course 2024, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: Post-it application
portfolios.content_zh: 這是一個使用 React 建立便條紙的練習。使用者可以寫下便條紙並且將資料儲存在 local storage 中。
portfolios.content_en: This is a exercise to build Post-it app with React. The user can write down the note, and the data will store in local storage.
portfolios.copyright: Exercise by The Complete 2024 Web Development Bootcamp, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: Preview card page
portfolios.content_zh: 使用 flexbox 及 響應式設計建立 3 列預覽卡；在手機裝置上呈現縱向排列，到了平板裝置時，就變成橫向排列。
portfolios.content_en: Use flexbox and responsive design to build the preview card. On mobile devices, they are arranged vertically, but on tablet devices, they are arranged horizontally.
portfolios.copyright: Challenge by Frontend Mentor, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: Interactive rating page
portfolios.content_zh: 一個簡單的頁面，讓使用者評分，並在提交後顯示'感謝卡'以及分數。
portfolios.content_en: Allow users to rate, and upon submission, show a 'Thank you' card.
portfolios.copyright: Challenge by Frontend Mentor, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: FAQ accordion page
portfolios.content_zh: 利用 jQuery 和 CSS 動畫來旋轉箭頭方向，點擊並展開文字內容。
portfolios.content_en: Utilize jQuery and CSS animations to rotate the arrow direction upon click and expand the text content.
portfolios.copyright: Challenge by Frontend Mentor, coded by YAL.

portfolios.title: Intro component with sign up form
portfolios.content_zh: 使用 jQuery 驗證外掛程式來驗證表單並顯示自訂訊息。
portfolios.content_en: Use jQuery validation plugin to validate the form and display custom message.
portfolios.copyright: Challenge by Frontend Mentor, coded by YAL.
